dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts and analyze each component.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to navigate complex problems and find creative solutions.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risks and challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and risks, embracing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth.
Your FarTwin will approach risks with caution, weighing the potential benefits and drawbacks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaboration as a competitive challenge, seeking to outdo and surpass others.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and mutual support, working collaboratively to achieve shared goals.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Preference
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach data analysis?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on numerical data and statistics, using analytical tools to identify trends and patterns.
Your FarTwin will prioritize qualitative insights, using narrative and descriptive data to gain a deeper understanding of complex issues.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into visual or performing arts, using mediums like music, painting, or dance to convey emotions and ideas.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through language, using writing, poetry, or storytelling to convey complex thoughts and feelings.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin adapt to change?

options.description: Your FarTwin will quickly adjust to new situations and challenges, embracing flexibility as a key strength.
Your FarTwin will approach change with a steady mindset, persevering through uncertainty and finding ways to adapt and grow.

dimensions.label: Diplomatic Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will address conflicts head-on, using clear communication and assertiveness to resolve issues.
Your FarTwin will prioritize finding mutually beneficial solutions, actively listening to opposing perspectives and seeking common ground.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and evidence-based reasoning to inform their decision-making process.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and gut feelings, using emotional intelligence to guide their choices.
